abstract: The New York Fed’s decision to sell the Maiden Lane assets was started by an offer from Goldman Sachs earlier this month.
snippet: The New York Fed’s decision to sell the Maiden Lane assets was started by an offer from Goldman Sachs earlier this month.
lead_paragraph: More than three years after the financial crisis, some of the most troubled assets involved in the housing collapse are still changing hands.

headline.main: New York Fed Sells $7 Billion in A.I.G. Assets to Credit Suisse
